Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4039 affecting package gcc for versions less than 13.2.0-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-4039 affecting package gcc for versions less than 13.2.0-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gcc is earlier than 13.2.0-7, affected by CVE-2023-4039
